statements: SELECT * FROM shipping_emissions;
SELECT id, ship_name, emission_type FROM shipping_emissions WHERE emission_amount > 100;
SELECT ship_name, emission_amount FROM shipping_emissions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(emission_amount) AS avg_emission FROM shipping_emissions WHERE emission_type = 'CO2';
SELECT ship_name, COUNT(*) AS total_shipments FROM shipping_emissions GROUP BY ship_name;
SELECT * FROM shipping_emissions WHERE emission_type = 'CO2' ORDER BY emission_amount DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, ship_name, emission_type, emission_amount, timestamp FROM shipping_emissions WHERE emission_amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT ship_name, emission_type, timestamp FROM shipping_emissions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY ship_name ASC, timestamp DESC
SELECT id, ship_name, emission_amount FROM shipping_emissions WHERE ship_name LIKE '%Maersk%' OR ship_name LIKE '%Evergreen%' ORDER BY ship_name, emission_amount DESC LIMIT 8
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rows, AVG(emission_amount) AS avg_emission FROM shipping_emissions WHERE emission_type = 'NOx' GROUP BY emission_type
SELECT * FROM emissions;
SELECT id, company_name, emission_date, emission_amount FROM emissions WHERE emission_amount > 1000;
SELECT company_name, emission_amount FROM emissions ORDER BY emission_amount DESC;
SELECT company_name, ship_name, emission_amount FROM emissions WHERE emission_amount < 500 OR emission_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM air_quality WHERE pollutant='CO' ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, ship_name, emission_amount, emission_date FROM emissions WHERE emission_amount > 1000 ORDER BY emission_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, pollutant, pollutant_level FROM air_quality WHERE location = 'New York' AND measurement_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT company_name, MAX(emission_amount) AS max_emission FROM emissions GROUP BY company_name HAVING MAX(emission_amount) > 5000 ORDER BY max_emission DESC;
SELECT AVG(emission_amount) AS avg_emission, MIN(emission_amount) AS min_emission, MAX(emission_amount) AS max_emission FROM emissions;
SELECT company_name, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emission FROM emissions GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY total_emission DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM emissions ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ship_id, emission_type, emission_amount FROM emissions WHERE emission_type='CO2';
SELECT * FROM emissions WHERE port_of_origin='Shanghai' ORDER BY emission_amount DESC;
SELECT ship_id, emission_type, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emission FROM emissions GROUP BY ship_id;
SELECT * FROM impact ORDER BY impact_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM emissions;
SELECT ship_id, emission_type, emission_amount FROM emissions WHERE emission_type = 'CO2' ORDER BY emission_amount DESC;
SELECT ship_id, SUM(emission_amount) AS total_emissions FROM emissions GROUP BY ship_id HAVING total_emissions > 1000 ORDER BY total_emissions DESC;

SELECT e.date, i.impact_value, a.air_quality_index FROM emissions e JOIN impact i ON e.ship_id = i.ship_id JOIN air_quality a ON e.port_of_origin = a.port_name WHERE e.date >= '2022-01-01' AND a.air_quality_index < 50;
SELECT port_of_origin, AVG(emission_amount) AS avg_emission_amount FROM emissions GROUP BY port_of_origin ORDER BY avg_emission_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM emissions;
SELECT ship_id, emission_category, emission_type FROM emissions WHERE emission_amount > 100;
SELECT ship_name, ship_type, ship_owner FROM ships WHERE ship_type = 'Cargo';
SELECT area_name, pollutant_name, pollutant_level FROM air_quality WHERE pollutant_level < 0.05;
SELECT ship_id, area_id, impact_level FROM impact ORDER BY impact_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM emissions WHERE emission_amount > 1000 ORDER BY ship_id DESC, emission_category ASC
SELECT ship_name, ship_type, ship_country FROM ships WHERE ship_type = 'Cargo Ship' AND ship_country = 'USA' LIMIT 5
SELECT area_name, pollutant_name, pollutant_level FROM air_quality WHERE pollutant_level >= 50 ORDER BY area_name ASC
SELECT ship_id, SUM(impact_level) AS total_impact FROM impact GROUP BY ship_id HAVING total_impact > 100
SELECT e.ship_id, e.emission_category, e.emission_amount, a.pollutant_name FROM emissions e INNER JOIN air_quality a ON e.ship_id = a.area_id WHERE e.emission_amount >= 500 AND a.pollutant_level < 30
SELECT * FROM emissions_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT ship_name, ship_country FROM ships WHERE ship_type = 'Cargo';
SELECT location_name, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT air_quality_index, air_pollution_level FROM air_quality WHERE air_quality_index > 50;

SELECT emissions_data.emission_amount, air_pollution_level, impact_description FROM emissions_data JOIN emissions_impact ON emissions_data.emission_id = emissions_impact.emission_id WHERE emissions_data.emission_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data;
SELECT emission_id, emission_type, emission_amount FROM emissions_data WHERE emission_amount > 1000;
SELECT ship_name, ship_country FROM ships ORDER BY ship_country ASC;
SELECT location_name, location_latitude, location_longitude FROM locations WHERE location_latitude BETWEEN 10.0 AND 20.0;
SELECT air_quality_index, air_pollution_level FROM air_quality JOIN emissions_impact ON air_quality.air_quality_id = emissions_impact.air_quality_id WHERE emissions_impact.impact_id = 1;
